name: Learn to dig
description:
My first published game!

The theme for the game jam was holes, so I made a game based on a man named George that digs holes to find gems.

George is a man that has never taken a break in his life. He is going to dig for gems to finally take the break he deserves.

Controls:

Walk Left - A

Walk Right - D

Look Up - W

Look Down - S

Mine - Down Arrow
